cyclone.name: ANA
cyclone.current_location: about 105 miles SSE of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking north-northwest, then turning north toward the South-North Carolina coastline
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the coastline between Myrtle Beach, SC and Cape Fear, NC

port.name: Port of Palm Beach District, FL

weather_observation.watch_coast: Edisto Beach SC to south of South Santee River SC
weather_observation.warning_coast: South Santee River SC to Cape Lookout NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern U.S. Atlantic coast from Georgia through North Carolina
weather_observation.wind: Brief periods of gusty on-shore winds and squalls possible; tropical-storm-force winds are not expected at the port.
weather_observation.rainfall: Passing outer rainbands could produce light to moderate showers, generally less than 2 inches.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along Palm Beach County beaches.
